DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare effectiveness alpha blocker ( Tamsulosin ) Anticholinergic ( Solifenacin ) relieve low urinary tract symptom cause DJ ureteral stent .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Tamsulosin Solifenacin Treatment Ureteral Stent Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patient sign informed consent randomly assign one 3 group ; group 1 ( control ) , group 2 ( tamsulosin ) group 3 ( Solifenacin ) . Ureteral stent symptom questionnaire ( USSQ ) use compare health relate quality life score .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo unilateral ureteral stent fixation : 1 . To relieve upper urinary tract obstruction cause ureteric calculus 2 . After ureteroscopic lithotripsy ureteral calculus . 1 . Patients LUTS stent fixation . 2 . Ureteral stent fixation open laparoscopic surgery . 3 . Bilateral ureteral stent . 4 . Patients develop complication related primary endoscopic procedure 5 . Patients develop stent related complication hematuria , acute pyelonephritis stent displacement
